service_alerts.subject: Chicago, Dallas, Frankfurt, London, Los Angeles, Seoul, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo, Toronto Network Outage

entries.message: We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Chicago, Dallas, Frankfurt, London, Los Angeles, Seoul, Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo, Toronto location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.  This has been effecting DNS resolution and overall network connectivity at this time.
